definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)

sentences.english: There's no reason to expect yourself to know everything in a month or two.
sentences.chinese: 沒理由期望你自己在一到兩個月內知道每件事。

sentences.english: The reason is easy to divine.
Metaphysic is the finding of bad reasons for what we believe on instinct.
sentences.chinese: 形而上學是我們爲相信直覺而找到的壞理由。

sentences.english: Theres a reason people cant wait for Christmas, and it haslittle to do with family reunions.
sentences.chinese: 人們等不及過聖誕節的理由和家人團聚沒有任何關係。

sentences.english: Know your paradigm and live it without excuses.
sentences.chinese: 知道你自己心中的標尺，無理由的相信它。

sentences.english: But the prosecutor declined on the grounds that the issue should be investigated in the US.
sentences.chinese: 但檢察官拒絕的理由是，這個案子應當在美國調查。

sentences.english: She noted down a number of objections in her note-book.
sentences.chinese: 她在本子上記下了好些反對理由。

sentences.english: For reasons that are not clear, sickle-cell disease is of very variable severity.
sentences.chinese: 理由是不明確，鐮狀細胞病是非常嚴重的變數。

sentences.english: In theory, both proposals have legitimate justifications.
sentences.chinese: 從理論上說，兩者都有充分的理由。

sentences.english: I inquired his reason for coming.
It is the perfection and the supreme adornment of the justified soul.
sentences.chinese: 這是完善和最高人民法院裝飾品的理由靈魂。

sentences.english: Argument against a hydrothermal origin is the sympathetic distribution of uranium and gold.
sentences.chinese: 反對熱液成固的理由是鈾和金有着一致的分佈。

sentences.english: Such excuses represent nothing to us at all.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的理由，照我們看來，不說明任何問題。

sentences.english: Apologists for religion point to charitable works as some sort of justification for it.
sentences.chinese: 辯護者提到慈善事業作爲爲宗教辯護的理由。

sentences.english: He was told that a council officer had reason to believe he was "dripping his cigarette" while driving his car.
sentences.chinese: 他被告知政府有理由相信他在開車期間“亂彈菸蒂”。

sentences.english: Multiple sign-ups shall be grounds for immediate termination of all involved accounts.
sentences.chinese: 多跡象上升將是全部複雜的賬的立即終止的理由。

definition: to use as an excuse/on the pretext/excuse/pretext
way of thinking/opinion/notion/to think of a way (to do sth)/CL:個|个[ge4]
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
